abstract: Andrew Adam Newman Advertising column on marketing campaign for Microsoft's Bing search engine; they are working on a tie-in with television program The Walking Dead.
snippet: Bing came up with some novel ways to associate its brand with “The Walking Dead,” a show whose premise makes product placement a challenge.
lead_paragraph: Bing came up with some novel ways to associate its brand with “The Walking Dead,” a show whose premise makes product placement a challenge.

headline.main: Marketers Work Around the Gore to Reach a Zombie Show’s Audience
headline.print_headline: Marketers Work Around the Gore To Reach a Zombie Show’s Audience
headline.seo: Product Placement on ‘Walking Dead’ Out, Bing Finds a Substitute
